title: Server transfer
body: Ok so I am going to transfer to EUW servers. What do I lose on my account and what do I keep? I am hesitant on transferring because I don't want to lose the skins I have and the champions I have. Would I lose those? Including my runes.

replies.body:
That'd be some shit if we took away your skins every time you transferred eh? 

No worries! You won't be losing any skins, champions or runes. You *might* have to set up those rune pages again, but that would be all. If your names are already being used on EUW, you'll get a need to change your names so that there aren't any duplicate names. 

The only significant changes will be if you happen to play ranked. You will probably need to play a single placement match to see where you'll be placed among those new region players!
Hey man, can you help me in the thread? Thanks!
